name: SPAM FTW
description:
Nerd tried his best to get his CV to many companies but HE FAILED. He found a way to get his CV to the companies by hacking into their system and knowing how many times he needs to spam his CV to them. NOW ITS YOUR JOB TO HELP HIM SPAM HIS CV, CAN YOU HELP?

How To Play :-

The rules are simple, just try to get as many CVs sent before you lose all your 3 chances.

*FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE PLAY IT IN FULLSCREEN.

*MAKE SURE THAT YOUR KEYBOARD LANGUAGE IS SET TO "ENGLISH"
